fields.description: Valfritt bilete for kortet.(Korta kan bruka berre bilete, berre tekst, eller begge)

semantics.description: Disse instillingene lar deg bestemme hvordan oppgavetypen skal oppføre seg.

fields.description: Dette valget betyr at man bare kan navigere fremover

fields.label: Skaler teksten til å få pplass i kortet
fields.description: Når man slår av denne vil kortets størrelse endre seg iforhold til mengde tekst

fields.label: Randomize cards
fields.description: Enable to randomize the order of cards on display.

fields.label: Cards Order
fields.description: Select the order of cards when displayed to the user.

fields.label: Enable the Got It feature
fields.description: Check this option to enable the user to confirm that they correctly guessed the contents of the back of the cards

fields.label: Maximum Score
fields.description: Score to give the user upon finishing this activity.

fields.label: Show title
fields.description: Show the title above the content

semantics.description: Ask the user if they want to display the cards in random order.
